DOC.brief_summary: The Activity of Indoleamine 2,3-dioxygenase in patients with Chronic Lymphocytic Leukemia (CLL) is studied.
DOC.brief_title: Indoleamine 2,3-dioxygenase (IDO) Activity in Patients With Chronic Lymphocytic Leukemia (CLL)
DOC.detailed_description: The Activity of Indoleamine 2,3-dioxygenase in patients with Chronic Lymphocytic Leukemia (CLL)is studied in patients and healthly controls.
DOC.criteria: Patients with CLL and lymphocyte count > 10 x 109/l Acute infection
